ofx:section.ofx:title: Usecases
ofx:section.ofx:paragraph: - Categories (what kind of User) - Use Case (Group of views/actions)

Use-Cases describes views and actions combined in a group. If you choose a category and select a Use-Case, you are able to add or delete views and the related action by clicking the plus button in the upper right corner. These changes take effect after relogging into the system.
